Articles.Content:
Hello and greeting from us at Questicorp, Kerbin's leading manufacturer in private and commercial aircraft. We are currently going through prototype testing for the Munhattan line of super maneuverable private aircraft (currently at version X-4) and the LT series of commercial cargo craft (currently at version X-1). Have a look around our range. Have a good day and PM me if you need help with any of our products or have a suggestion.

The Munhattan Series Triplane

Even though the aircraft are still in testing, we can tell you some basic facts about the upcoming Munhattan M-1.

The M-1

Highest speed achieved: 550 m/s (supersonic) @ ~12km

Take-off speed: 20-25 m/s

Max Gee's pulled: 8 G

Power-plant:1 FX-10 Turbojet (aka Turbofan jet)

Weight at Take-off: Under Testing

Max Known Range: Unknown

(GOING THROUGH FINAL TEST STAGE)

The LT Series

Even though the aircraft are still in testing, there is the upcoming LT J-32.

The J-32

Classified

Edited October 5, 2012 by thisiscool1
Supersonic speed is around 340m/s, in the air, thisiscool1 =)
